title: SUI Gouache | Rosy Duo | 15mlx2 Tubes Set | Matte Pastel Watercolor Gouche Paints, Rose, 0.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)
features: Vibrant Colors | Unlock your creativity with exceptionally beautiful, unique & whimsical Rusty Rose & Baby Yellow gouache paint tubes. Essential palette for artists of all levels perfect gift for any art enthusiast.
Smooth & Blendable | Effortlessly applicable & seamless blending of creamy gouche paint. Easy layering on paint palette paper mixed media sketchbook with long lasting colors like liquid watercolors
Versatile & Diverse Applications | Sui gouache paints are great with artistic pairs like bullet journal kit, pocket watercolor painting book, paperage dotted journal notebook to express creativity

High-Quality Pigments: Crafted with precision, Sui gouache paint are highly pigmented & deliver intense, opaque colors with excellent coverage. Your artwork will stand out with vibrant hues that last.
Portable Package | Designed for convenience, our gouache paint set is stylish & travel-friendly. It's easy to put on mini watercolor palette with lid making it an excellent gift choice for artists
description: About SUI Gouache SUI is IllustratorArt Tutor from Korea She has been learned art and painting quite a long time After trying oil pen acrylic ink pens chalk enamel and other paints, She felt in Gouache by its fairy-tail mood colors While Travel around the world, She worked with most of world famous branded gouache After long journey of exploring she decided to create her own GOUACHE, Easy to use but rich enough for professionals, adorable by itself 2020 She created her first mini SUI gouache sets with 12 colors in case Contains unique modern yellow pink red orange green black golden brown dark blue In 2021, She created second version of her gouache, set of 2 X 15ml tubes. They are 8 colors in total, and each duo contains 2 color of tubes as below Basic Duo : White 15ml + Beige 15mlRosy Duo : Baby Yellow 15ml + Rusty Rose 15mlPeach Duo : Peach 15ml + Baby Pink 15mlGreen Duo : Lime 15ml + Dokdo Evergreen 15ml Currently She is also working on creating metallic Sliver Acrilic Art Paint Edition Which will be released as bottles on late 2021 Note Mix less, Gouache might become muddy if mix too much Follow the color recipe for easier color expression But they are already adorable by themselves Pouring medium quantity or could be cracked Cautions in use Although gouache is sharing many similar parts with watercolor pan It contains a lot more of pigment which makes them heavy Fine with normal palette but could be broken when its dry due to component Squeeze gouache out small amount for each time on paper pallets
